children.html:
"Self-expression" has become a pop-culture phenomenon. It is one of the favorite subject of vloggers, influencers and self-help gurus. Yet, watching their videos, it seems rather unclear what "self-expression" is. Is it saying what you feel when you feel it? Is it painting your hair pink or wearing whatever clothes you want? Is it creating art?

Regardless, "self-expression", according to these advocates, is great. It is great for you, for everyone around you and even for society. We should self-express more and all the time, they say, and the world would be a better place.
What is the one thing we should never neglect? Self-expression.

+*+*+* Subscribe! NEW VIDEOS EVERY WEEK!+*+*+*

Be-you-tiful friend,

Are you hiding out or holding yourself back from being fully YOU and being more visible in your life?

Maybe you want to share your voice publicly or be freer with your self-expression, but you don't, perhaps fearing what people will think of you?

I express myself with short hair, I express myself with doing things that are outside of my boundaries. 
        And that's just me! And everybody expresses themselves differently.
        [...]
        I just wanna see a better change in the world, and I hope that maybe me cutting my hair, or me dying my hair, 
        me doing things that are not so "normal", and people probably see as embarrassing, or probably look at me like I'm an idiot, 
        maybe will help you guys.
LUFF MY SUNFLOWERS, THANKS FOR EXPRESSION YOURSELF

To me, the more I study personal development, the more I look into what
        it really takes to live an amazing, exciting, huge life, the kind of life
        that I want for you, the kind of life that I picture for myself, is to be 
        getting more into the frame of being able to express yourself authentically.
